channel.title: Knight guard/possess bug
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I was playing Knight and guarding the King. I was also possessed to attack the King. I ended up killing myself protecting King from myself.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
It should either be that I guard the King - and don't attack. Or I attack the King and don't guard. It makes no sense that I can perform both actions at the same time
#### Steps to reproduce:
Knight guard King and get possessed to attack King
#### Comments:

item.title: Knight guard/possess bug
item.dc:creator: Moleland
item.description:
It seems weird, but it isn’t a bug. When you guard, you kill all attackers and yourself. In this situation, it was you in both cases.
